content:
Kestenberg family

1 Samuel KESTENBERG                  1776-79 - 1833 #17
 + Sprinca KNOBLACH                  (Abraham)
  2o Chaja Sora (Salomea) KESTENBERG  1796-1801 - ??after 1860 Hot Springs AR
    * Wolf ROSENFELD                 1796 - 1821 #166
          married Feb 18, 1815 #5
        FAMILY LISTING
    * Sinai KIRSCHBAUM               1798
          banns 1823 #46
    * Dawid REINER                   Jan 21, 1807 Krakow
          married May 13, 1824 #17
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Jakob KESTENBERG                1801-02 - ?1846 #536
    + Gittel Mariam WEISSBLUM        Dec 11, 1802 Krakow
          married Mar 19, 1820 #12,  divorced Jun 16, 1825 #1
    + Jachwet HOROWITZ               1803
          banns 1826 #21
 + Rachel KNOBLACH                   1788-92 (Abraham)
  2o Szeindel KESTENBERG             1808-10 - ? after 1870
    * Abraham Hirsz HONIGBAUM        Nov 6, 1806 Krakow - ? before 1870
          married 1828 #33
